title: 24h02  Exemption limited to drivers.
text:
The OT exemption contained in Sec
13(b)(l7) applies to “any driver” employed by an employer engaged in the
business of operating taxicabs. The exemption is thus limited to drivers only.
(For discussion of nonexempt work, see FOH 24h03.)
